Use "specify this" to conveniently include the additional washbasin items to the Close Coupled Doc M pack or list all the items in the illustrated column. The room set is described in Part M as "Doc M Close Coupled Pack and additional washbasin for standing users". This provides the unisex wheelchair toilet facility suitable for use where only one washroom exists within a building. TMV3 approved basin mixers to help prevent scalding with integral thermostat to reduce legionella risk. Water saving delay fill 4.5 litre cistern.

Title: Twyford DOC M Exposed Shower PK CONC Fixings Bl
Description: This Twyford Doc M Exposed Shower Pack is designed to provide enhanced accessibility, safety, and convenience in showering areas.  The components are ergonomically designed to enhance accessibility, making showering safer and more comfortable for users with limited mobility. Ideal for both commercial and residential settings, the Doc M Shower Pack meets the requirements of Document M, ensuring accessibility for all users, including those with disabilities. Designed with concealed fixings, this shower pack provides a clean, sleek look while ensuring a secure and sturdy installation. The pack includes grab rails and a fold-up shower seat to provide additional support and safety for users, reducing the risk of slips and falls. Crafted from high-quality materials, the Twyford Doc M Shower Pack is built to withstand regular use, ensuring long-lasting durability and reliability.

Title: I/S CONTOUR 21+ DOC M STD WHITE RAILS LH
Description: Doc M Standard low level left corner pack, WC with spacer box low level cistern, grab rails, hinged support rail with toilet roll holder, seat no cover with retaining buffers. Doc M pack, specifically designed to latest recommendations which call for the tap to be positioned more conveniently on the side of the basin closest to the seated user. These packs have a left hand or right hand single taphole basin specific to that need. Taps have copper tails as these are preferred in many applications. TMV3 approved basin mixer to help prevent scalding with integral thermostat to reduce legionella risk.
